definition: Kangxi, title of the reign (1661-1722) of the Kangxi Emperor 聖祖|圣祖[Sheng4 zu3]
surname Kang
healthy/peaceful/abundant
(used in names)/(bound form) (literary) bright/prosperous/splendid/genial
variant of 熙[xi1]
the Kangxi Dictionary, named after the Kangxi Emperor, who in 1710 ordered its compilation, containing 47,035 single-character entries

sentences.english: What were two evolutionary advances most critical in human evolution ?

sentences.english: At sixty one years, Kangxi had the longest reign of any Chinese Emperor.
sentences.chinese: 在六十一年，康熙曾统治时间最长的任何中国皇帝。

sentences.english: During Kangxi's reign in the Qing Dynasty, the government surveyed land throughout the country.

definition: Yongzheng, reign name of Qing emperor (1722-1735)
Qianlong Emperor (1711-1799), sixth Qing emperor, princely title 寶親王|宝亲王[Bao3 Qin1 wang2], personal name 弘曆|弘历[Hong2 li4], reigned 1735-1799
reign name of second Qing emperor (1644-1662)

reign name of Ming emperor (1573-1619)
